text: tamarathi yahuda ane isa'i'o kadapi raji nahi thaya, jyam sudhi ke tame te'ona panthavala na bani ja'o, tame kahi do ke allahanum margadarsana ja margadarsana che ane jo tame potani pase jnana avi gaya chatam pharithi te'oni maneccha'onum anusarana karyu to allaha pase na tamaro ko'i dosta hase ane na to ko'i madada karanara
